examples: The unions mobilized thousands of workers in a protest against the cuts.
Los sindicatos movilizaron a miles de trabajadores en protesta contra los recortes.
They successfully mobilized public opinion against him.
Movilizaron con éxito a la opinión pública en su contra.
They were unable to mobilize the resources they needed.
No pudieron movilizar los recursos que necesitaban.
The troops were ordered to mobilize.
Se ordenó a las tropas que se movilizaran.
